title: Kocaman Ailem
resume: Hulusi's life is ruined by an accident. Hulusi, who has survived to death, is determined to make up for the mistakes he has made in the past. Hulusi struggles to find three women in the past who hurt their heart. He gets help from Demir for this. But things get mixed up when Hulusi learns that there are three children from these three women.
